Sentencas: Cathodic electrolytic deposition has been utilized for the preparation of polyvinyl alcohol films and organoceramic films based on poly(diallyldimethylammonium chloride) and Zr, Ce, Gd hydroxides.
Titulo: Cathodic electrodeposition of polymer films and organoceramic films

Sentencas: Films of various thicknesses were deposited on Ni, porous Ni-zirconia cermet and La0.8Sr0.2Fe0.8Co0.2O3-y ceramic substrates prepared by tape casting.
Titulo: Cathodic electrodeposition of polymer films and organoceramic films

Sentencas: By varying the current density, deposition time and concentration of additives, the amount of the deposited material could be controlled.
Titulo: Cathodic electrodeposition of polymer films and organoceramic films

Sentencas: The morphology of the films was studied by scanning electron microscope.
Titulo: Cathodic electrodeposition of polymer films and organoceramic films

Sentencas: Such films could be used in the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell laminates.
Titulo: Cathodic electrodeposition of polymer films and organoceramic films
